comments.body: Note for the future `required=False` is the default, so you can omit it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +134,138 @@        self.argument_spec = netapp_utils.na_ontap_host_argument_spec()
        self.argument_spec.update(dict(
            state=dict(required=False, type='str', choices=['present', 'absent'],
                       default='present'),
            origin_volume=dict(required=False, type='str'),
